original_title: Paddy Mcguiness All Star Balls Ups
overview: Paddy, McGuinness, the everyman working class hero, shows you how footballers are overpaid, oversexed and over rated in his latest DVD - All Star Balls-ups.  With the help of a host of his famous football buddies Paddy comments shows us clips of the funniest, humiliating and most outrageous balls-ups in football to date.
title: Paddy Mcguiness All Star Balls Ups
